name: Ben the Penguin
description: A fluffy, pastel-blue crochet penguin with a cozy white belly, rosy cheeks, and tiny yellow feet. Topped with an adorable winter hat, it's the perfect blend of cuteness and warmth!
creator: @mariecreations

name: Angry hamster
description: A tiny, white crochet kitten with soft brown ears and paws, a little round nose, and a cute yellow collar. Absolutely adorable and pocket-sized for extra charm!
creator: @urbinacreations

name: Totoro Plushie
description: Pastel-lavender crochet Totoro with big, sleepy eyes, a round white belly, and tiny arms. Topped with a cute green leaf on its head, itâ€™s irresistibly cozy and cuddly!
creator: @ghiblicrochet

name: Tulip Bunny
description: Sleepy bunny with delicate, blushing cheeks, and soft, closed eyes. Sprouting from the top are vibrant, pastel pink tulips that add a gentle pop of color.
creator: @cuteblobcreate

name: Pompompurin Pattern
description: With this pattern you're able to create your own crochet Pompompurin traditional plushie with floppy ears, a sweet smile, and a charming little beret.
creator: @freecrochetpatterns

name: My Melody & Kuromi
description: My Melody & My Melody have always been best friends, as opposite as they can be, they will always be by each other's side and share an adorable appearance.
creator: @sanriocrochethehe

name: Pink Pug Bee
description: Pink Pug Bee is an adorable option to decorate your room as it is incredibly comfortable and soft to hug, also being charismatic by looking funny with his tiny pink fairy wings.
creator: @doggythecreator

name: Strawberry Pompompurin
description: Pompompurin plushie dressed as a strawberry is a very cute design, created for Sanrio lovers into strawberries and fresh-looking plushies.
creator: @sanriocrochet

name: Moon & Star
description: Couple keychains, perfect for gifting to a very special person so you can both have a part of each other all the time.
creator: @xuxucrochet

name: Croissant Plushie
description: Delicious looking croissant plushie, creates a very cute and cozy aura as it is adorable and soft, it looks perfect in any space and will always give a smile to anyone who sees it.
creator: @foodieknits

name: Ternurin Plushie
description: Sylvanian family members are extremely adorable and cute to collect, this white cat Ternurin dressed in a pink outfit and hat is an amazing study companion and friend.
creator: @ternurines

name: Pink Heart Bag
description: Crochet bag heart-shaped, medium size designed to be comfortable and easy to take to anywhere and fill with your basic daily needs and complement your best outfits.
creator: @giannasommese

name: Sad Violin Hamster
description: Mini sad violin hamster from the internet meme, perfectly represents girls and theys who feel tiny and cry a lot about little things. It will fit your style no matter what it is because it is neutral colored.
creator: @loverwithadollarsign

name: Shark costume cat
description: Sam is a little tiny cat who really enjoys dressing up as his ocean friends, this version of himself is currently dressed as his close friend, shark mark.
creator: @missprincess_lana

name: Pink miffy pattern
description: Miffy is a white bunny with a pink bunny hat, she's a very feminine bunny who likes being in pink decorated spaces and loves pastel colors. Make sure she's in a place where she matches aesthetics.
creator: @crercrochet
